sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Form, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Col, Container, Row } from 'reactstrap'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours'; import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import calculateAverageRating from "../utils/averageRating"; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams(); const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, maxGroupSize} = tour; const {totalRating, averageRating} = calculateAverageRating(reviews); return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAverageRating === 0 ? null : averageRating}{totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated' ) : (({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price} per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* =============== tour review section ================ */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)
); }; export default TourDetails;
